channel.title: Client Won't Run
channel.description:
Hello,
This happens to me on every client base i download.
When i click Run Client, it either opens and closes and doesn't load the client, or..
It says,
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file'
How can i fix this and make it run?
Thanks!

item.title: Client Won't Run
item.dc:creator: @bamse9400 bamse9400
item.description:
@bamse9400 wrote:

If you dont got an english system that could be the reason. Maybe the runner is set to run java from C:/Program Files/Java then edit to C:/Program file folder name/Java

Read full topic

item.title: Client Won't Run
item.dc:creator: @tman915 tman915
item.description:
@tman915 wrote:

Can you post the code you are using to run it.
Thanks. I can try to help if I see it

Read full topic
